summary: Penny Sue Pritzker  is an American business executive, entrepreneur, civic leader, and philanthropist.
full_text:
Penny Sue Pritzker  is an American billionaire businesswoman, entrepreneur and civic leader who is currently serving as the 38th United States Secretary of Commerce. She is the founder of PSP Capital Partners and Pritzker Realty Group. She is also co-founder of Artemis Real Estate Partners. She is a member of the Pritzker family.
In 2012, Chicago magazine named her one of the 100 most powerful Chicagoans. In October 2015, Forbes estimated her net worth at US $2.4 billion. In 2009, Forbes named Pritzker one of the 100 most powerful women in the world.
^ "PSP Capital Partners". Retrieved October 10, 2012. 
^ "Artemis Real Estate". 
^ Bailey, Berstein, Burke, Colburn; et al. . "100 Most Powerful Chicagoans". Chicago Magazine. 
^ "Penny Prtizker". Forbes. Retrieved 2 October 2015.
title: Penny Pritzker
